review.title: “Great learning environment!”
review.pros: Pros – Company offers an overall great learning environment. If an employee expresses interest in something, management will express interest as well and provide additional learning opportunities.
review.cons: Cons – While there are several opportunities for employees to learn more about the company/industry as an employee, growth opportunities within the company are few due to the relatively small size of the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management is very good in communicating with all levels of the company. May want to consider however bridging the learning opportunities provided with potential growth within the company.

review.title: “Ok Place to work Part Time”
review.pros: Pros – You make your own schedule in the position. you just have to give at least 18 hrs a week when you are availble to work.Pay is fair for what is asked of you.
review.cons: Cons – They play favorites.Too much office gossipThere is very little chance for advancement in this company.They do not handle their data well making work alot harder.extremely inefficient processes.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – to advance the company i would say use your database better. use a system that will put to use all of the information you have collected quickly and effectively. do a better job with your sample department too.
